original_text:
“I have heard the insults of Moab
    and the taunts of the Ammonites,
who insulted my people
    and made threats against their land.
korean_text: 내가 모압의 비방과 암몬 자손이 조롱하는 말을 들었나니 그들이 내 백성을 비방하고 자기들의 경계에 대하여 교만하였느니라

sentences.original_text: I have heard the insults of Moab
and the taunts of the Ammonites
and made threats against their land
